website_summaries.verdict: A unique design and narrow footprint makes this fireplace perfect for tight spaces and tables.
pros: Mounting holes can fasten the fireplace down to a table for extra security
Protective glass is easy to clean
Fuel canisters creates about two hours of continuous flames
cons: Overfilling the fuel canister can lead to a larger, more dangerous flame if not careful

customer_reviews.title: DANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: DANGER!!! We bought this as a gift for my sister-in-law a couple of months ago. She’s has used it about 5 or 6 times, and last night, it made a hissing noise, and then it exploded. Glass went everywhere. Luckily, their children weren’t outside when it happened. They have used only approved fuel. Be very careful!!! We will be contacting the company immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Doggos

customer_reviews.title: Almost burned my house down.
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions and don't overfill like I did. I almost burned my house down. Very nice construction and design, but it didn't make me smart enough to read the directions. Entirely my fault. I'll buy another one. Always have an extinguisher in your house BTW. Edit: got my second one and I love it. Cobbled together with the first one that I destroyed, I have a 3 pane, 2 burner fireplace now.
customer_reviews.author: Doug in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: We lit our fire inside for the first time last night and it was amazing! We lit it on top of our coffee table and were so impressed that while the fireplace gives off heat, none of it effects the surface that the fireplace is sitting on. It made the place so cozy. Additionally, it came with an instruction manual which I know a lot of people are saying that theirs didn't. Mine also came with a funnel, and a sparker to safely light the fire. I wasn't expecting all of this, but was extremely excited that it was all included because it makes the product so much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tabletop fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the fireplace about a week ago and we are really enjoying it! Our one concern was how much heat is emits to the tabletop and we have found that there is almost no heat emitted to the surface. The fire has a nice soothing, dancing flame that is pleasant to watch. It actually gives off some heat which we really enjoy. It works great indoors and eventually we will try it outdoors when the weather permits. Easy to assemble and easy to use. So far we are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pcb2013

customer_reviews.title: I like the look & feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the look & feel...it doesn’t seem as cheap as some of the others (not that it was as cheap as the others I was looking at), but my only complaint is that even after saturating the wick part with the suggested fuel, it doesn’t stay lit sometimes :/ even with no wind, using it indoors. Not sure what that’s about(?) also, it’d be nice if there was some way to tell when it’s 3/4 of the way full with fuel...I have no idea how to tell, & no idea how many ML/ OZ it holds, so I can’t even guess based off of how much of the girl bottle I use :/
customer_reviews.author: MaryannR

customer_reviews.title: instant ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use on my outdoor dining table but after bringing it into the master bath for the Winter, that's where it stayed. It adds a nice ambiance in both places, but i didn't feel it put out much heat. Its really nice to look at when i'm soaking in the tub and i appreciate the clear design that blends nicely wherever you put it.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Wick or No Wick
customer_reviews.text: Because of all the confusion about a wick or no wick, I called the Ignis company. The answer I received was that this product used to be sold with the wick, a 5"x8" white wick that is placed in the fuel container, then the fuel added and the wick absorbs most of it. He said many customers would call after about 2 years asking to buy a new wick. Now, they are selling the product without the wick, and I just happened to receive one with a wick. I was told the fireplace can be used with or without a wick.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Friends of ours had this fireplace in their mountain vacation home and I fell in love with it. It's the perfect size for our bookcase in our living room, and gives off a soothing flame. It's modern design fits in nicely with our home's decor. I love this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Urbaniak

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace comes remarkably well packed and with everything you'd need to use it including a funnel (but not the fuel). It doesn't look or feel cheap by any account. On a high flame (with the vent wide open) it can put out a good amount of heat. Filled up with the vent just slightly open I was able to run it for over 6 hours non-stop. Not much heat with the smaller flame but still very nice ambiance. It does seem to need almost a third of a liter (standard bottle the fuel sells in) to light up so even though it will last a while it will require you to burn a good bit of fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Just received this table-top fireplace absolutely love it, my girl friend interior designer has just ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this table-top fireplace absolutely love it, my girl friend interior designer has just ordered one for her store and feels many of her clients will be quite impressed with her display. Quick delivery and very well packaged was quite surprised that they even included a matching butane lighter to enable in lighting of fireplace. Would definitely recommend to friends. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ignis Tab Tabletop Ventless Ethanol Fireplace delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my wife as a Valentine's Day present. She loves it and particularly likes that it is like a real fireplace. We could detect no odor which is important to us. The flame is adjustable by sliding panels to make the flame bigger or more concentrated. I have shared a picture and movie with friends and family and they have thought it was a great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Adds Coziness to Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a fireplace, but have lived in apartments and lofts that don't exactly have room or ventilation for a fireplace. This makes a room feel cozy with a real flame. Incredibly easy to use. Provides hours of fire with one fill.
customer_reviews.author: nwgreen

customer_reviews.title: Table Top fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous and fun little fireplace. It really does heat the area and has great atmosphere. My friend had one and I loved it, so I also bought one. You can use it inside or out and the fuel lasts quite a while. My only concern was that there were no instructions to set it up with it. I figured it out, but it would help if there were set up instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday in perfect condition. Assembly took just a couple minutes. Filled it with some Ignis Bio-fuel and voila! Very satisfied with this purchase. The tabletop fireplace looks great and provided a nice ambience to the room. Flames were large and lasted over 2 hours on approx 1/2 bottle of fuel. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Samurai_CTT

customer_reviews.title: Great repalcement for the larger real thing
customer_reviews.text: We added a room so lost the only place in the house where there could have been a fireplace. I sorely missed having one as my previous home had a really lovely fireplace. This really fills the bill, sturdy easy to use, attractive and just the right ambience
customer_reviews.author: Bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: screened in deck on the upper level of my townhouse that faces beautiful Michigan woodlands
customer_reviews.text: I have a small covered, screened in deck on the upper level of my townhouse that faces beautiful Michigan woodlands. The ambiance is especially enjoyable in the evening at twilight. I purchased two Ignis tabletop fireplaces, which have added an "outdoor campfire" atmosphere. Absolutely perfect...beautiful flame, no fuel smell, and perfectly safe if you follow the simple manufacturer's instructions. They arrived very well packaged and were easy to assemble, although the mounting bolt, grommet and safety glass sequence was not clear. I called the provided number for clarification and the answers were quickly provided.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very popular gift. Looks great anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our friends in Florida. We have one of our own and always use it inside and outside. Our friends loved it. While were visiting them we used it 4 times. Now they want to buy one to gift to others.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Use the funnel it comes with to fuel the tank. Very simple and safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most popular item I've added to my home decor. Unbelievable attention piece. All my friends are going to buy. Very nice, well built, and easy to fuel up. I will be buying a second one for my dinning table. The flames dance around blue orange color. Outstanding ambience to any room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and elegant
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace looks elegant and well made with good thick glass and nice metal. It came with a metal hook to open and close the two sliding lid doors when they are hot, as well as a funnel, which are both very useful. I was also very pleased with how well packaged the parts were, there was no way any of the parts could break or scratch inside the box. We are giving this as a gift and I am really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd fireplace...very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. It warms a 10x20 room to a comfortable temperature. I have a second fireplace hanging on the wall in another room and have been very happy with the which is why I purchased a second unit for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Great little fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tabletop fireplace for a room that I wanted to help take the chill off. I am very happy with this product. Not only does it add ambiance to the room but it provides the small amount of heat I was looking for. The only suggestion I would have for the manufacture would be to put assembly instructions in the manual. Once I took the bolts apart I was able to easily able to figure it but a little diagram would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Krystopa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and followed the instructions on setup and use very closely. I am amazed! I took an iPhone video in slow motion of the flames and impressed my friends on Facebook. It is everything I expected based on the product description and reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: I added fuel (highly recommend purchasing the funnel to accomplish this) and VOILA
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I unpacked it right away to set it up. Even though it comes without picture instructions, it was still intuitive and I put it together in a matter of minutes. I added fuel (highly recommend purchasing the funnel to accomplish this) and VOILA! -- We had a beautiful, elegant fire on our back porch! I highly recommend the Ignis Tabletop Fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonOrBust

customer_reviews.title: Great Tabletop Fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift to my brother. Matches his glass coffee table, where he uses it. He said that at his Holiday Party, it was a conversation topic, everyone loved it, and several people said they want to purchase one just like it. He and his wife are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, I was kind of nervous to light it the first time after reading some reviews so I was really careful not to overfill or spill the fuel, So far my husband and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this delightful tabletop fireplace! The sleek design adds elegance to my living room and warmth to what was once simply a non working fireplace, now with the Ignis Tab Tabletop fireplace my living room is more inviting. This morning we woke up to snow and a below freezing temps., I added the fuel and within a minute had a sweet fire to sit next to while I drank my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Aimeekk

customer_reviews.title: Product works exactly as described and is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service and the product works great! You can set it on a tabletop or in your fireplace. We put the Ignis fireplace on a wood tabletop and the item did not affect the wood in any way, We are enjoying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike the Wonder Boy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a table top ethanol fireplace. I particularly like this one because of the built-in snuffer and you can't beat the price! This piece really sets the ambiance, especially for those of us without a fireplace built into our home. Compared to my other, similar fireplace this one is slightly larger, has the built-in snuffer, and has a cloth wick-like material. On one hand, I don't like that I can't see how much fuel I am pouring into the trough but I do think the wick might conserve fuel and offer longer burn time. The item arrived on time and was well packed. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Nicely put together
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a wonderful product however I thought that fit and finish could have been a little nicer considering there was some small scoring marks on some of the metal work, overall worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Cassar Jr

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much after buying for our outdoor coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Loved so much after buying for our outdoor coffee table, we bought a second! I highly recommend purchasing the longer funnel that Amazon suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Di Zazzo

customer_reviews.title: Creates wonderful ambience!!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very nice! My fireplace is in the family room in the lower level, so I do not have a fireplace in the living room upstairs. I put this one on my coffee table and it really adds warmth to that area. Love it]] Does use fuel quickly though which is why I only gave it a 4 rating. Very easy assembly and to get lit.Does use fuel quickly though which is why I only gave it a 4 rating. Very easy assembly and to get lit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as birthday gift for my wife and she loves it! Works as advertised, perfect size for our home and great compromise if a gas/wood fireplace is not an option
customer_reviews.author: Germinator

customer_reviews.title: Creates a very nice ambiance!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for both our coffee table and outdoor patio table. We get many compliments on this clever fireplace. The item comes unassembled but set up was a breeze! It does use quite a bit of fuel...one qt bottle lasts about 2.5 hours. Overall, we would highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table top fireplace is perfect for a fire inside or outside exactly where you need a flame!! It is easy to assemble and extremely attractive and works well! Very easy to use and requires no maintenance!! Perfect for us...we live in Florida and this gives the perfect ambience without hearing the entire house!! We also purchased a wall fireplace for when we want more heat!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tabletop Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my parents to enjoy some outdoor ambiance on their covered deck. They have reported that the item seems well built and they cant wait to use the tabletop fireplace once fuel arrives. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Cruz Mountain Family

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Simple and elegant. Sturdy product and the flame looks great in it. Easy to put together. Looks great outside on our table.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to our living room! Easy to use and both practical and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Heaney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic overall. My only quibble - it was a minor pain to assemble... I had to push really hard on the pegs to get them to screw in through the glass, and it was annoying, and took me longer than it should have. Now that it's up and running though, major thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product—-high quality materials, easily assembled, well designed, fair price and works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: John Sandeen

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and effective. Flame not as strong as pictured ...
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and effective. Flame not as strong as pictured. Design and quality high.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use on the patio. Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patron175

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and very enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: This tabletop fireplace is wonderful. We love it and so do our friends. I highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Struby

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome ambiance piece and it takes the dampness out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome ambiance piece and it takes the dampness out of the air on these cold nights. I wish it came with a funnel to fill it though. I did set my end table on fire one night because I filled it too full and apparently when it gets hot it bubbles up a bit and dripped onto the end table. Scary for a few moments but I was able to put it out with minimal damage. Otherwise it is awesome :0)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and the product description was very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Furst

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool on the patio. Easy assembly and instant ambiance. Lights easily and extinguishes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barsoom35

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Great as decoration and it warms small bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing on the table in the screened in 3-season room
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item to my son and his wife in NC. It is amazing on the table in the screened in 3-season room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functional design
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this beautiful example of "form follows function ". Ease of assembly and use. Arrived very well packaged. In the evening on the porch, it creates a lovely and tranquil atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: gfusco

customer_reviews.title: perfect table top fireplace
customer_reviews.text: this is a great fireplace it has just enough heat to sit by and watch the flames dance. it is very easy to start and close down for the night.
customer_reviews.author: tree man mjjjjj

customer_reviews.title: Why wouldn't you enjoy this. It's great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect tabletop fireplace. Easy to assemble and maintain. Ignis fireplace is everything it claims to be. Nice for indoors or snuggling on a porch in a glider during a fall evening. Thanks for the cozy memories. Well done sir!
customer_reviews.author: janc

customer_reviews.title: and I love it! It looks great on the dining room ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my ventless fireplace, and I love it! It looks great on the dining room table. It's better than candles.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is perfect for your tabletop and is so easy to use. The flame burns brightly and lasts a long time. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: JimT

customer_reviews.title: Great, fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Great, little fireplace that can be used almost anywhere. We have really been enjoying it and it is easy to use and clean. IgnisProducts.com
customer_reviews.author: Sean K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fireplace is great! Assembly was easy, flames are mesmerizing, appearance of entire product is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Romantic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tabletop fireplace to use as a centerpiece for our dining room table. We LOVE it! Sets just the right mood for romantic dinners. We like it better than candles!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece for my lounge area
customer_reviews.text: This product is a quality piece that I will definitely recommend to all my friends. It arrived in great condition well packaged and in a timely fashion. I placed it on the table in my lounge dining room area and it is the perfect addition for an evening just to have a glass of wine. Five stars and I must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Casynella A. Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well made product. Well packaged. Came with funnel included
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up and it looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail yesterday. Very easy set up and it looks fantastic! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Ignis Tab Tabletop Ventless Ethanol Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I received this item in one day and love it! It took less than five minutes to assemble and looks beautiful on an outdoor coffee table. It comes with a wick and hook to snuff the flame. I am just waiting on the fuel to arrive (sold separately) and look forward to enjoying this quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little fireplace. Creates a nice ambience for the tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: Sally K

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: We use this fireplace almost every night. It creates a great ambiance. Product is very sturdy and easy to put together. We've gotten lots of comments from friends and will be purchasing additional fireplaces as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR ATMOSPHERE ON KITCHEN COUNTER, DINING ROOM TABLE OR ROOM WITH OUT A FIREPLACE, REALLY SETS A TRANQUIL MOOD
customer_reviews.author: A B Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This is just beautiful and easy to use. Portable so we can take it on the deck for summer parties . Sits on the table inside during colder weather and we use it all the time. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS FANTASTIC !!!
customer_reviews.text: I USE THIS NOT AS A TABLETOP FIREPLACE, BUT A FIREPLACE IN MY RENOVATED MILL HOUSE'S FIREPLACE WITH WAS ORIGINALLY BUILT AS A COAL BURING FIREPLACE. THE FIREPLACE IS SHALLOW, BUT THIS TABLETOP VENTLESS ETHANOL FIREPLACE PERFECTLY FITS THE BILL. IT GIVES OFF ADEQUATE HEAT, BUT MORE IMPORTANTLY AMBIANCE OF REAL FLAME - IT SOOTHS THE SOUL. ONLY GOTCHA IS THE INITIAL POOF ASSOCIATED WITH LIGHTING FOR THE FIRST TIME. THAT WASN'T EXPECTED NOR WRITTEN INTO THE DIRECTIONS, BUT HAS BEEN NOTED IN OTHER POSTINGS.
customer_reviews.author: CSCSSD

product_meta.title: Portable Ventless Bio Ethanol Tabletop Fireplace - Tab | Ignis
feature_bullets: Ventless - no chimney, no gas or electric lines required
Tabletop, Freestanding - can be placed anywhere in your home (indoors & outdoors)
0.7 Liter Burner ~ 2 hour burn time per refill

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
